CEO RESPONDS to My “Employee Social Credit Score” Video (GAGE 2.0 Breakdown)

The CEO of GAGE—yes, the app that tried to rate your vibes at work like Yelp for employees—just responded to my video calling it out. And apparently, they’ve “removed the score.” So everything’s fine now, right? Not exactly.

In this video, I break down GAGE 2.0: what’s changed, what hasn’t, and why it still looks like a gamified surveillance system for hourly workers dressed up as empowerment.

From “commitment over time” to “recognition frequ
title: CEO RESPONDS TO MY "EMPLOYEE SOCIAL CREDIT SCORE" VIDEO
